stories.original_title: Microsoft CTO: Why the OpenAI Board Fired Sam Altman
stories.generated_headline: Microsoft CTO Weighs In on OpenAI Board's Controversial Ouster of Sam Altman
stories.summary: Microsoft's CTO sheds light on the tumultuous events surrounding Sam Altman's firing from OpenAI, citing concerns over management style and AI safety as key factors.

stories.original_title: Practical Security Guidance for Sandboxing Agentic Workflows and Managing Execution Risk
stories.generated_headline: Securing Agentic Workflows: A Practical Guide to Sandboxing and Risk Management
stories.summary: As AI agents become increasingly autonomous, experts urge developers to prioritize security measures to prevent potential breaches and data leaks. This article provides actionable guidance on implementing sandboxed environments and mitigating execution risks.

stories.original_title: Show HN: Judgment Boundary – Stop as a First-Class Outcome for AI Systems
stories.generated_headline: Revolutionary AI Framework Treats Stopping as a Primary Outcome, Redefining Model Architectures
stories.summary: Judgment Boundary introduces a groundbreaking approach to AI systems, allowing them to stop and output results like humans, rather than forcing a prediction. This innovation has the potential to significantly improve model performance and reliability.

stories.original_title: Gemini 3 Flash: frontier intelligence built for speed
stories.generated_headline: Gemini 3 Flash Redefines Efficiency in AI Model Architectures with Breakthrough Performance
stories.summary: Gemini 3 Flash sets a new standard for speed and cost-effectiveness in frontier AI intelligence, delivering unparalleled performance. This innovation marks a significant milestone in the development of efficient AI models.

stories.original_title: We Developed a Rule Database
stories.generated_headline: Breakthrough in AI Decision-Making: Novel Rule Database Developed
stories.summary: Researchers have created a comprehensive rule database that enhances the transparency and explainability of AI models, paving the way for more trustworthy decision-making systems.

stories.original_title: Project Genie: Experimenting with infinite, interactive worlds
stories.generated_headline: Google Unveils Project Genie, a Revolutionary Interactive World Generator
stories.summary: Google AI Ultra subscribers in the U.S. can experiment with Project Genie, a research prototype that enables users to create and explore infinite, interactive worlds. This innovative tool showcases the potential of AI-driven content generation.

stories.original_title: Google's year in review: 8 areas with research breakthroughs in 2025
stories.generated_headline: Google's Research Achievements in 2025: A Leap Forward in Artificial Intelligence
stories.summary: Google's research breakthroughs in 2025 span eight key areas, showcasing significant advancements in AI and related technologies. From innovative applications to fundamental discoveries, these breakthroughs are set to shape the future of tech.

stories.original_title: Attention Isn't All You Need for Emotion Recognition:Domain Features Outperform Transformers on the EAV Dataset
stories.generated_headline: Domain Features Outperform Transformers in Emotion Recognition Study
stories.summary: Researchers investigate multimodal emotion recognition using the EAV dataset, finding that complex attention mechanisms may not be necessary for optimal performance.

stories.original_title: Opening digital markets so AI can shop — and negotiate — for you
stories.generated_headline: Breaking Down Digital Walls: Microsoft Researchers Advocate for Open Agentic Economy
stories.summary: Microsoft researchers propose an open agentic economy where AI agents can interact freely, promoting innovation and benefiting both businesses and individuals. This vision aims to shift the current 'walled garden' approach to a more decentralized ecosystem.

stories.generated_headline: Breakthrough Neural Models Push Boundaries of AI Capabilities
stories.summary: Researchers unveil cutting-edge neural models that achieve state-of-the-art performance in various tasks, signaling a significant leap forward in artificial intelligence research.

stories.original_title: Towards a science of scaling agent systems: When and why agent systems work
stories.generated_headline: Unlocking the Secrets of Scalable AI: Researchers Uncover Key to Building Effective Agent Systems
stories.summary: A new study sheds light on the science of scaling agent systems, revealing when and why these systems succeed or fail, and providing valuable insights for building more efficient AI models.

stories.original_title: Moltbook Isn't the Real Risk – Autonomous AI Agents Are
stories.generated_headline: Autonomous AI Agents Pose Greater Risk Than Moltbook's Security Flaw
stories.summary: A critical vulnerability in Moltbook, an AI-only social network, exposes fundamental security flaws in autonomous AI systems, highlighting the risks of rapid AI deployment without adequate security infrastructure.

stories.original_title: Data Science and Data Mining
stories.generated_headline: Unveiling Patterns in the Digital Age: The Convergence of Data Science and Data Mining
stories.summary: Researchers explore the symbiotic relationship between data science and data mining, shedding light on their interplay and collective potential to drive insights. This convergence is revolutionizing industries and redefining the boundaries of data-driven discovery.

stories.original_title: Causal Imitation Learning Under Measurement Error and Distribution Shift
stories.generated_headline: Navigating Uncertainty: Causal Imitation Learning Under Imperfect Observations
stories.summary: Researchers tackle the challenges of offline imitation learning when faced with noisy measurements and distribution shifts, paving the way for more robust AI decision-making.

stories.original_title: The Ten Commandments of Agentic AI
stories.generated_headline: Decoding the Core Principles of Agentic AI: A New Framework for Intelligent Systems
stories.summary: Researchers have outlined ten fundamental principles for agentic AI, aiming to guide the development of more sophisticated and autonomous intelligent systems. This framework seeks to shape the future of AI research and applications.

stories.original_title: Into the Omniverse: Physical AI Open Models and Frameworks Advance Robots and Autonomous Systems
stories.generated_headline: Breakthrough in Autonomous Systems: NVIDIA's Open-Source Initiative Fuels Robotics Innovation
stories.summary: NVIDIA's open-source models and frameworks are revolutionizing robotics and autonomy by providing critical infrastructure for innovation. This move is expected to accelerate advancements in physical AI.

stories.original_title: Neural Signals Generate Clinical Notes in the Wild
stories.generated_headline: Neural Signals Translate into Clinical Notes: AI Breakthrough in EEG Analysis
stories.summary: Researchers have developed an AI system that generates clinical reports from long-term EEG recordings, streamlining the process of diagnosing and interpreting neurological disorders. This innovation has the potential to revolutionize clinical workflows and improve patient care.

stories.original_title: Two kinds of AI users are emerging
stories.generated_headline: The Great Divide: Two Distinct Profiles of AI Users Take Shape
stories.summary: As AI adoption accelerates, users are splitting into two distinct camps, each with unique characteristics and expectations from the technology.

stories.original_title: Clearspace (YC W23) Is Hiring an Applied Researcher (ML)
stories.generated_headline: Clearspace Seeks Applied Researcher to Drive ML Innovations
stories.summary: Clearspace, a Y Combinator-backed startup, is looking for an applied researcher to join its team and advance its machine learning capabilities. The role involves tackling complex research problems and driving innovation in ML applications.

stories.original_title: The next chapter for AI in the EU
stories.generated_headline: EU Ushers in New Era of AI Advancement with OpenAI's Economic Blueprint 2.0
stories.summary: OpenAI's EU Economic Blueprint 2.0 aims to boost AI adoption and skills across Europe with new data and partnerships. The initiative seeks to accelerate growth and position the EU as a leader in AI innovation.
